thread.section_title: Airtasker Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Airtasker | www.airtasker.com
thread.title: Lisa Kuspira

author: Lisa Kuspira
title: Lisa Kuspira
text: My friend told me about Airtasker a while ago and I first tried it when looking for a fencer, then decided to get a Quote: from one I had used before. But as I was in a hurry to get our rental cleaned before we moved in I decided to give it a try. I wasn't prepared for how quickly I got replies (which was great), and wasn't sure how to reply to each individually. It seems if you miss a comment right after it's written you lose your chance to respond directly unless you go into their profile. Anyhow, I loved being able to see comments and reviews before I made a final decision; which was hard because they all seemed competent! Anyhow, I was happy with my choice and glad to get the job posted, assigned and done in a matter of days.
